==Overview==
The Community Qualifier for the Smash Summit was open to anyone for the first round, in the second round, the top 20 nominated players face off again to decide which 6 will qualify. 

The first Qualification phase took place from 9th to 13th October, while the second Qualification phase took place from 14th to 22nd October.
